meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a cartoon.
meanings.sent1: The colorful, cartoonlike characters made the children smile.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a cartoonlike drawing of a funny cat.
meanings.sent3: The cartoonlike scene of the talking animals was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her exaggerated gestures were cartoonlike, adding humor to the play.
meanings.sent5: The cartoonlike world of the comic book came to life with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Having the exaggerated or simplified style of a cartoon.
meanings.sent1: The cartoonlike features of the car made it stand out in the parade.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a cartoonlike animation that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cartoonlike expressions on his face always made people laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were so cartoonlike, it felt like watching a live animation.
meanings.sent5: The cartoonlike clouds in the sky added a whimsical touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: Done in a style that imitates a cartoon.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting was cartoonlike, with bold lines and bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The costume had a cartoonlike design that brought the character to life.
meanings.sent3: The cartoonlike voice she used for the character made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His actions were so cartoonlike, it was as if he stepped out of a comic strip.
meanings.sent5: The cartoonlike font on the poster gave it a playful and fun vibe.
